amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 76, 92, 93, 122, 124, 125, 131, 135, 141, 144, 147, 148, 151, 155, 162, 167, 168 and 169 printed in House Report 113-108. See page D570 of the Congressional Record of Thursday, June 13, 2013, for description of en bloc amendments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of Part B amendments Nos. 76, 92, 93, 122, 124, 125, 131, 135, 141, 144, 147, 148, 151, 155, 162, 167, 168 and 169 printed in House Report 113-108.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A026) offered by Mr. McKeon.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments en bloc (A026) offered by Mr. McKeon.
